name: Eternal Winter
detailed_description:
Take the role of a chief! Lead an expedition seeking to collect data and explore an inhospitable island full of wildlife. Build, hunt and gather resources, because storms are coming and they will demand the most of your strategic skills.
-maintain a healthy balance in the ecosystem, do not over-hunt or else the delicate ecosystem will begin to collapse, and a damaged ecosystem means less meat for your village!
-Use your kayak to reach large chunks of ice and small islands.
-Collect and upload data about the weather and melting ice caps.


some features:
-Base building and management :use the expedition members to build and gather resources.
-Dog sled: 4 loyals dogs that will provide swift transportation, you just have to take care of their basic needs.
-Kayak!
-Storms: Storms that get more demanding as days go by, they will test your strategic skills as the leader of your village.
-Working 2 player online co-op

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel 4xxx Series w/ 512MB VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any on-board chip will work
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: i5 quad core 2.60ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 555/ or 1gb VRAM
  • Sound Card: Anything with Surround capabilites
